name: Block Puzzle Jewel :Gem Legend
description:
A new brick classic block puzzle match game, join 5,000,000 players for free now!

##How to play Block Puzzle Jewel:
*Drag cube blocks to fill up the lines vertically or horizontally.
*Blocks can be held freely.
*Try to remove multiple lines at a time to get a higher score.
8Game over if no room for extra blocks.

##Block Puzzle Jewel Features:
*100% FREE Game
*Suitable for all ages
*Play Offline without WIFI
*No move limit
*Wonderful block jewel and special effect

##Block Puzzle Jewel Tips:
Use boosters to beat hard levels

Are you ready to challenge? Train your brain with brick classic puzzles. Download for free and start your Block Puzzles adventure.

Please reach out to us if you have any question.
